body_html:
@martinwicke Let me fix what you have indicated above, I would like to keep the "generation_mode" in the params if that is okay, I can stop the attribute command and simply ignore the value of this attribute. I think this will be handy in the future.

Do I need to issue a git command to pull back your updates or can I just update my current repository and pull again with the updates or does this loose your fixes?

body:

Do I need to issue a git command to pull back your updates or can I just update my current repository and pull again with the updates or does this loose your fixes?
